info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued March 07 at 3:01AM MST until March 07 at 7:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph are expected. Localized higher gusts are possible. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ to 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected over Lake Mohave.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
